summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Brazilian lottery betting application (Quina & Dupla Sena). All backend APIs working perfectly. Frontend functional with minor chart rendering issues.

design_issues.issue: Chart width/height calculation errors in Recharts components
design_issues.symptoms: Console warnings about chart dimensions being -1
design_issues.details: Charts still render correctly but show console warnings about width/height calculations

passed_tests: All 20 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Dashboard loads with next draws and latest results
Quina page bet generation and saving
Statistics page shows data and charts
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Fix chart dimension calculation warnings in Statistics page Recharts components. All core functionality working perfectly.
